price: “Dovedite ga da ga ljudi vide”, rekoše, “da posvjedoče.”
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
